You guys know me already...

But how well?

Play 2 truths and a lie!

One of these is wrong! But which one?

I love to play ping pong. I once beat Brent Cromley in an eating contest. I am for scuba!

Yep!

Nope!

I don't play ping pong, but these cats do.
